title: For the purpose of this regulation plot area/size shall be reckoned after deduction of ‘area of the plot to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority’ under these Regulations
clause_text: For the purpose of this regulation plot area/size shall be reckoned after deduction of ‘area of the plot to be handed over to MCGM/Appropriate Authority’ under these Regulations.
